brainly_data.question: Gabrielle daily borrows $1,000 at a 6 percent add-on rate for one year.what is the finance charge?answers
brainly_data.subject: Business

all_answers.question: Gabrielle daily borrows $1,000 at a 6 percent add-on rate for one year.what is the finance charge?answers
all_answers.subject: Business
all_answers.text:
P - principle of the loan
FC - finance change or total interest 
N - number of months the loan is force

FC = ($1,000 x .06 x 1) 
FC = $60

Finance charge is $60.
